attributes.action: Change the new London 2012 Olympic logo back to the version used for the Olympic bid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I had just seen the new logo for the London Olympics and I think that there was no need for a change especially since there are already issues with the Olympic budget why did more money have to be spent on rebranding?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
